alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Clark; Fayette; Greene; Logan; Madison; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 1:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...SHOWERS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CHAMPAIGN AND SOUTHEASTERN LOGAN COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO, NORTHWESTERN FAYETTE COUNTY IN CENTRAL OHIO, CLARK AND EASTERN GREENE COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO, MADISON AND SOUTHWESTERN UNION COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 200 PM EDT... At 130 PM EDT, showers were located along a line extending from near St. Paris to near Springfield to near Jamestown, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Marysville, Urbana, London, West Jefferson, Cedarville, St. Paris, Jamestown, West Liberty, South Charleston, Mechanicsburg, North Lewisburg, West Mansfield, Choctaw Lake, Harmony, Lisbon, Brighton, Milford Center, Lafayette and South Vienna. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 54 and 81. I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 78 and 84. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Champaign; Clark; Fayette; Greene; Logan; Madison; Union
